means: （为表示感情或敬意将著作、乐曲、艺术作品等）题献给（某人、某事业等）(to)
（在书、音乐或作品的前部）题献辞

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"奉献"之意。
means: dedicate ： 正式用词，指献身于某一崇高事业或目的，也可指把著作题献给他人。
devote ： 普通用词，指决心把全部身心、精力、时间等献给某一目标，某一个人或致力于某一事业。

word_mean: 为建筑物举行落成仪式

sentence.Network_en: He felt that medicine was the most important cause to which he could dedicate himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 他觉得医学是他能够为之献身的最重大的事业.

sentence.Network_en: She vowed to herself that she would dedicate her life to scientific studies.
sentence.Network_cn: 她默默地发誓要献身于科学研究.

sentence.Network_en: To my father I dedicate this volume in token of affection and gratitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 我谨以此书献给我的父亲,以表示对他的爱戴和感激之情.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'devote to sacred use by solemn rites'): from Latin dedicat- 'devoted, consecrated', from the verb dedicare

entry.def: If you say that someone has dedicated themselves to something, you approve of the fact that they have decided to give a lot of time and effort to it because they think that it is important.

example.ex: Back on the island, he dedicated himself to politics...
example.tran: 回到岛上后，他便投身于政治。

example.ex: Bessie has dedicated her life to caring for others.
example.tran: 贝茜一生都致力于照顾他人。

entry.tran: 把(书、戏剧、音乐作品等)献（给）
entry.def: If someone dedicates something such as a book, play, or piece of music to you, they mention your name, for example in the front of a book or when a piece of music is performed, as a way of showing affection or respect for you.

example.ex: She dedicated her first album to Woody Allen...
example.tran: 她把自己的第一张专辑献给了伍迪·艾伦。

example.ex: This book is dedicated to the memory of my mother.
example.tran: 谨以此书献给我已故的母亲。

entry.tran: 为(建筑物或教堂)举行奉献（或落成）典礼
entry.def: If a building or church is dedicated to someone, a formal ceremony is held to show that the building will always be associated with them.

example.ex: The other day, in a little church near Brighton, a window was dedicated to the memory of the Revd. Michael Scott...
example.tran: 几天前，在布赖顿附近的一个小教堂，人们以一扇窗户来纪念迈克尔·斯科特牧师。

example.ex: The church is dedicated to St Mary of Bec.
example.tran: 该教堂供奉的是贝克的圣玛丽。

means.word_mean: 1. give entirely to a specific person, activity, or cause;

sentences.sentence: "She committed herself to the work of God"
"give one's talents to a good cause"

means.word_mean: 2. open to public use, as of a highway, park, or building;

sentences.sentence: "The Beauty Queen spends her time dedicating parks and nursing homes"

means.word_mean: 3. inscribe or address by way of compliment;

sentences.sentence: "She dedicated her book to her parents"

means.word_mean: 4. set apart to sacred uses with solemn rites, of a church

stems_affixes.word_buile: pre预先+dica=dic命令+ment表名词→预先命令做→进入困境
pre预先+dic说话,断言,写+ate表动词→预先说→断言
predicate[n.谓语 v.断言]+ion表名词→n.论断
ab离开+dic命令+ate表动词→不再命令→退位
de加强+dic说话,断言,写+ate表动词→一再说→努力献身
in进入+dic命令+ate表动词→说进去,使明白→指示,表明
pre预先+dic说话,断言,写+ate表动词→预先说→断言
vin力量+dic说话,断言,写+ate表动词→用力量说→拥护

Sentence.sentence: Smith has written a breezy guidebook, with a series of short chapters dedicated to specific aspects of urbanity - parks, say, or the various schemes that have been put forward over the years for building the perfect city.

means.word_mean: 奉献; 贡献; 把…奉献给
以…供奉，以…奉献，把…奉献给崇高的目的

sentences.en: The ancient Greeks dedicated many shrines to Aphrodite.
sentences.cn: 古希腊人以许多神殿供奉(爱与美的女神)阿佛洛狄特。

sentences.en: He dedicated himself to conserving our natural resources.
sentences.cn: 他把毕生精力用于保护我们的自然资源。

means.word_mean: (为表示感情或敬意将著作、乐曲、艺术作品等)题献给(某人、某事业等)(to)

sentences.en: To my teacher I dedicate this dictionary in token of affection and gratitude.
sentences.cn: 我谨以此词典献给我的老师，以表示对他的爱戴和感激之情。

means.word_mean: (为特定用途、任务、目的而)拨出；指定给(to)

sentences.en: The country health agency has dedicated one inspector to monitor conditions in nursing homes.
sentences.cn: 该国卫生机构已指定一名检查员监测各疗养院的情况。

jushi.english: He dedicated everything that he could.
jushi.chinese: 他奉献了他所能奉献的一切。

jushi.english: He felt that medicine was the most important cause to which he could dedicate himself.
jushi.chinese: 他觉得医学是他能够为之献身的最重大的事业。

jushi.english: The school dedicated the new building on Sunday.
jushi.chinese: 星期天,学校举行新楼落成仪式。
